entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Dungeon and Puzzles
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

-- Awards: ‚óè 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection ‚óè Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual ‚óè Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award About: Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves. There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms. To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move. Features: ‚óè Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban ‚óè 150 handcrafted rooms ‚óè Fantasy themed pixel art ‚óè Non-linear dungeon map -- ‚óè Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/nekolyst ‚óè Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ‚óè Join our Discord server https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Photo Eraser for iPhone
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

On Sale. Original $ 4.99. Photo Eraser magically remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone and instantly fix your photos. Powered by the latest revolutionary photo InPaint algorithm, Photo Eraser performs the best among all other iPhone erasers that ruin your photos, including popular professional photo processing softwares. A variety of experiments shows the intelligent Photo Eraser will give you better and more natural, amazing results than any similar tools. Photo Eraser quickly remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone, including logo, text, data stamp, watermark, acnes, people... without any specialist knowledge and instantly fix the photos automatically as if they were never there. InPaint, improve and repair your photos. It targets to be a simple yet effective photo healing app for all iPhone users. Get the magical photos done in seconds-to-minutes instead of minutes-to-hours. People all over the world use Photo Eraser for iPhone every day to beautify their photos. Free download Eraser for iPhone today to be more creativity! Easy to get use & started. You only need mark unwanted area by red color, Photo Eraser for iPhone will make your photo much better in a minute. ‚Ä®‚Ä® Photo Eraser for iPhone features highlights: ‚Ä® ‚àö Remove watermarks, date stamps and much more unwanted objects from photos for iPhone.‚Ä® ‚àö Delete unwanted people from photo for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Erase text, signatures and other undated objects from photos for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Make skin imperfections vanish for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Completely non-technical. ‚àö Support all iPhone device: iPhone 6s+, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6+, iPhone6, iPhone 5s, iPhone5c, iPhones 5, iPhones 4s, iPhone4, iPhone 3gs‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Reviews by our users: - Works pretty well! by rfgf1 It does a fairly thorough job of removing things from the backgrounds of pictures, or objects that are not in the main focus of the original. Using the lasso and only straight lines and drawing a box around the object to be removed, is where I have seen my best results. - Amazing by Twon from VA Works great! I'm using a iPhone 6, IOS 8 Feedback: ‚Ä®Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: market@effectmatrix.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Doodle Baseball Game
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you‚Äôre a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter‚Äôs box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Vostok ‚Äî Story Maker
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Welcome to Vostok ‚Äì your ultimate companion for crafting captivating stories and stunning collages, designed to elevate your social media presence! With Vostok, transforming your ideas into professional-grade posts and stories is now a breeze. Whether you're a blogger, photographer, or simply love sharing your life's moments on social media, Vostok provides all the tools you need to create content that will make an impact. Our sleek and user-friendly app seamlessly combines your passion for photography and storytelling, offering a dynamic platform to showcase your awe-inspiring moments. Embracing a minimalist style, Vostok becomes your canvas for unlimited creativity. A vast collection of templates, stickers, and effects empowers you to design unique stories that reflect your individuality. But Vostok goes beyond creative freedom; it's all about simplicity. Our intuitive interface makes editing and sharing your content effortless, freeing up more time for you to focus on crafting compelling narratives that your followers will adore. No more waiting! Embark on your Vostok journey today and craft captivating posts and stories that leave a lasting impression! Here's a glimpse of some of our features: ¬∑ 200+ design templates for social media ¬∑ Exclusive fonts with Cyrillic support ¬∑ 450+ unique stickers ¬∑ Atmospheric dust and grain effects for photos ¬∑ Variety of backgrounds: paper textures, marble, gradients, colors ¬∑ Ad-free with no subscription requirements ¬∑ Dark mode compatibility Recognized as one of the Best Apps of 2019 by Apple. With over 200+ templates, Vostok is your go-to toolkit for creating standout social media content. We eagerly look forward to your ideas and feedback. Connect with us at hello@vostokapp.ru or drop us a direct message on Instagram at @vostokapp.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: FocusDots ¬∑ Focus What Matters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Speech to Text : Voice to Text
entry.id: Speech to Text : Voice to Text-us-1758025448754
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • MonthÔºö$1.99
  • YearÔºö$11.99
  • 6 MonthsÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Speech to text : Voice to text is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content. Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words! Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.) Whether you‚Äôre a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today! This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad : „ÉªLonger Record time: -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR. „ÉªUnlimited save & edits „ÉªTranscribed text can be edited directly. „ÉªIdeal for both individual and group transcription „ÉªBackground support for voice recognition. „ÉªOn-device Speech Recognition. ‚Ä¢ Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents. ‚Ä¢ Share your text on social networks. ‚Ä¢ Copy your text to other apps. ‚Ä¢ Send your text as an email or text message. ‚Ä¢ Create PDF instantly with single click. ‚Ä¢ Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly ‚Ä¢ Text Analysis using AI. ‚ñ∫ Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokm√•l, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. Technology: New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy, Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands. Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ? 1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio. 2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere. 3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen! 4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love. 5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app ! SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS We offer three auto-renewing subscription options: $1.99 / month $9.49 / 6 months - Save 20% $14.49 / 1 year - Save 40% The price corresponds to the same price segment , which are set in the ‚ÄúApple App Store Matrix‚Äù for other currencies You can cancel a subscription anytime by turning off auto renewal though your iTunes account settings.This must be done 24 hours before the end of subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription. Terms of Service : https://voiceovermaker.com/termsofuse Privacy Policy: https://voiceovermaker.com/privacypolicy Support: Please email for any suggestions/feedback voiceovermakerz@gmail.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI ‚Äì All-in-One Device and Utility Toolkit MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools ‚Ä¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state ‚Ä¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage ‚Ä¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details ‚Ä¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running ‚Ä¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage ‚Ä¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space ‚Ä¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries ‚Ä¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance ‚Ä¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools ‚Ä¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status ‚Ä¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses ‚Ä¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools ‚Ä¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options ‚Ä¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases ‚Ä¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats ‚Ä¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options ‚Ä¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools ‚Ä¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements ‚Ä¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies ‚Ä¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support ‚Ä¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status ‚Ä¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events ‚Ä¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks ‚Ä¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly ‚Ä¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition ‚Ä¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors ‚Ä¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app ‚Ä¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone ‚Ä¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session ‚Ä¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness ‚Ä¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup ‚Ä¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more Highlights ‚Ä¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools ‚Ä¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities ‚Ä¢ No ads or in-app purchases ‚Ä¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient ‚Ä¢ Compatible with all iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Frequent updates with new tools ‚Ä¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind ‚Ä¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for ‚Ä¢ Device monitoring and optimization ‚Ä¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks ‚Ä¢ Scanning documents and QR codes ‚Ä¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts ‚Ä¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders ‚Ä¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters ‚Ä¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control ‚Ä¢ Performing simple network diagnostics ‚Ä¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy ‚Ä¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.title: 60 Parsecs!
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age. Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN? This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets. Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive? Bon voyage! SCAVENGE & EVACUATE With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy. SURVIVE & DECIDE Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you. EXPLORE & CRAFT Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure. LEAD & PROTECT As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 60 Seconds! Reatomized
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content! NEW GAMEPLAY MODE Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test! NEW OPPORTUNITIES to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style? NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members! NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter! NEW ACHIEVEMENTS! With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind? Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland. Good luck.

entry.title: Moncage
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

Application Description

Moncage is a stunning vignette puzzle adventure developed by Optillusion. The game takes place inside a mysterious cube, with each side of the cube housing a unique world: be it an old factory, a light tower, an amusement park, or a church, etc. At first sight, they may seem random and unrelated, but upon closer look, you will become mesmerized by the subtle and intricate ways of how these worlds connect‚Ä¶ „ÄêSolve Puzzles with Mind-Boggling Optical Illusions„Äë Use your imagination and spare no brain cells to find the connection and pinpoint every possible interaction between different sides of the cube, then watch as the magic unfold in front of you. „ÄêCollect All Photos to Unveil the Story„Äë Behind the puzzles, there lies a story with a surprising twist for the player to uncover. Collect the photos from obscure corners and angles to reveal the underlying story, one photo at a time. „ÄêGet Unstuck with Thoughtful Hints„Äë There is a multitude of guidance systems to help prevent players from getting stuck. Focus can be activated to highlight the key items to the solution, while hint texts are available to provide further clarity. And, if all else fails, video walkthroughs can be unlocked as the ultimate safety plan. „ÄêProve Your Puzzle-Solving Skills with Medals„Äë There are a total of 15 achievements in the game, each corresponding with a Medal that has been crafted with a uniquely stunning design. A complete collection of the 15 Medals could be the perfect evidence to attest to your master puzzle-solving skills~ „ÄêConnect with us:„Äë Twitter: @MoncageTheGame Email: moncagethegame@gmail.com Discord: https://discord.com/invite/TEVX2uPEsj

  • TotalitarianÔºö$0.49

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. That‚Äôs how religions were born ‚Äì as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text ‚Äì you‚Äôre already in the game! All that‚Äôs left is to install ‚Äì and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith ‚Äì in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects ‚Äì and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype ‚Äì perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator ‚Äì Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!
